column1: IP Addresses used by PLC, HMI, Remote I/O, I/O Linc Module, Robot 1 Warehouse & 2 Palletizer, etc...

column2: IP Address
NOTE:  Above IP's are Temporary until final IP's are available
Modbus Address
Modbus Coils

column1: NOTE:  Prior to an Initial PLC CYCLE RUNNING digital signal on, ALL BINS 1-12 MUST BE IN PROPER WAREHOUSE LOCATION
BINS WILL BE LABLED 1 THRU 12 AND AN RFID Tag with that ID WILL ALSO BE ON THE BIN FOR CONFIRMATION
WHENEVER they enter A WAREHOUSE CONVEYOR PICK LOCATION

column2: Cycle Steps
column7: ERP MODBUS Actions

column2: PLC CYCLE RUNNING signal on
column7: Check if this is HIGH before setting signals.  Report error if not.

column2: ERP System turns on PICK BIN XX & TO RECEIVING STA 1 digital signals
column7: Triggered by Material Receipt Stock Entry (before Submit) - Set PICK BIN XX and TO RECEIVING STA 1 high

column2: PLC communicates to STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT
STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT Starts Pick to Receiving Routine (from home position)
PLC turns on PICK TO RECEIVING IN PROCESS digital signal
column7: Wait for PICK ERROR or TO RECEIVING IN PROCESS set HIGH (timeout default 60 seconds or script parameter WAIT_TIMEOUT_SECS)

column2: ERP System turns off PICK BIN XX & TO RECEIVING STA 1 digital signals
column7: Set PICK BIN XX and TO RECEIVING STA 1 to LOW

column2: STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT completes Pick and Place Routine (returns to home position)
PLC turns off PICK TO RECEIVING IN PROCESS digital signal
column7: Wait for PICK ERROR or PICK TO RECEIVING IN PROCESS

column2: PLC Pulse on PICK TO RECEIVING COMPLETE digital signal (1-sec.)
column7: Wait for PICK ERROR or PICK TO RECEIVING COMPLETE

column2: Receiving Operator manually removes BIN from Gravity Conveyor 1
column7: If no PICK ERROR, submit the Stock Entry document.

column2: Receiving Operator manually places Stock Entry parts in BIN Received from Storage
column7: If a PICK ERROR occurs, the submit will be rolled back and the Mateial Receipt document will remain in "Saved" status.

column2: Receiving Operator Manually places BIN Received from Storage onto Gravity Conveyor 2
column7: Create a Modbus Event logging the error

column2: PLC CYCLE RUNNING
PLC Detects R1 CONV 2 BIN PRESENT PE
column7: How do I know which BIN is to receive the inventory?  I need that information to pick the warehouse location for the Material Transfer.

column2: PLC Reads BIN RFID Tag and records BIN Number (Should be same as BIN # Picked to Receiving)
PLC communicates BIN Location to STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT
STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT Starts Pick from RECEIVING to STORAGE Routine
PLC turns on PICK TO STORAGE IN PROCESS digital signal
column7: Wait for PICK TO STORAGE IN PROCESS to be HIGH

column2: STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT completes Pick and Place Routine (returns to home position)
column7: Generate a Material Transfer Stock Entry document.

column2: PLC turns off PICK TO STORAGE WAREHOUSE IN PROCESS digital signal
column7: Save the Material Transfer Stock Entry document when PICK TO STORAGE IN PROCESS is HIGH

column2: PLC Pulse on PICK TO STORAGE WAREHOUSE COMPLETE digital signal (1-sec.)
column7: If no PICK ERROR, Submit the Material Transfer Stock Entry document.

column2: Return to Sequence Step 1
NOTE: A PICK ERROR digital signal indicates an incompleted sequence
column7: If PICK ERROR, roll back the submit of the Material Transfer Stock Entry Document

column2: and should be treated as an INCOMPLETE ORDER in the ERP SYSTEM
column7: Create a Modbus Event logging the error.

column1: STORAGE TO PICK AND PACK SEQUENCE:
column7: ERP MODBUS Actions

column2: PLC CYCLE RUNNING
column7: Check if this is HIGH before setting signals.  Report error if not.

column2: ERP System turns on PICK BIN XX & TO PICK & PACK  STA 2 digital signals
column7: Triggered by Pick List (before Submit) - Set PICK BIN XX and TO PICK&PACK STA 1 high

column2: PLC communicates to STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT
STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT Starts Pick BIN XX from STORAGE to PICK & PACK Routine
PLC turns on PICK TO PICK & PACK IN PROCESS digital signal
column7: Wait for PICK ERROR or TO PICK&PACK IN PROCESS set HIGH (timeout default 60 seconds or script parameter WAIT_TIMEOUT_SECS)

column2: ERP System turns off PICK BIN XX & TO PICK & PACK STA 2 digital signals
column7: Set PICK BIN XX and TO PICK&PACK STA 1 to LOW

column2: STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT completes Pick from STORAGE to PICK & PACK Routine
PLC turns off PICK TO PICK & PACK IN PROCESS digital signal
column7: Wait for PICK ERROR or PICK TO PICK&PACK IN PROCESS

column2: PLC Pulse on PICK TO PICK & PACK COMPLETE digital signal (1-sec.)
column7: Wait for PICK ERROR or PICK TO PICK&PACK COMPLETE

column2: PICK & PACK Operator manually packs parts from BIN/S XX into Shipping Bin
column7: If no PICK ERROR, submit the Stock Entry document.

column2: PICK & PACK Operator manually places BIN XX on gravity Conveyor 4 (Return to Storage)
column7: If a PICK ERROR occurs, the submit will be rolled back and the Mateial Receipt document will remain in "Saved" status.

column2: PICK & PACK Operator manually places Shipping Bin with all packed parts on Conveyor 6
column7: Create a Modbus Event logging the error

column2: PLC detects POWER CONV 5 INFEED PE and turns on Conveyor 5 to transfer Shipping bin to Shipping Station

column1: PICK AND PACK TO STORAGE SEQUENCE:

column2: PLC CYCLE RUNNING
column7: How do I know which BIN is to receive the inventory?  I need that information to pick the warehouse location for the Material Transfer.

column2: PLC Detects R3 CONV 4 BIN PRESENT PE
PLC Reads BIN RFID Tag and records BIN Number
PLC communicates BIN Location to STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT
STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT Starts Pick Routine (from home position)
column7: Wait for PICK TO STORAGE IN PROCESS to be HIGH

column2: PLC turns on PICK TO STORAGE IN PROCESS digital signal
column7: Generate a Material Transfer Stock Entry document.

column2: STORAGE WAREHOUSE ROBOT completes Pick and Place Routine (returns to home position)
column7: Save the Material Transfer Stock Entry document when PICK TO STORAGE IN PROCESS is HIGH

column2: PLC turns off PICK TO STORAGE IN PROCESS digital signal
column7: If no PICK ERROR, Submit the Material Transfer Stock Entry document.

column2: PLC Pulse on PICK TO STORAGE COMPLETE digital signal (1-sec.)
Return to Sequence Step 1
column7: If PICK ERROR, roll back the submit of the Material Transfer Stock Entry Document

column2: NOTE: A PICK ERROR digital signal indicates an incompleted sequence
column7: Create a Modbus Event logging the error.

column2: and should be treated as an INCOMPLETE ORDER in the ERP SYSTEM
